title: Travel log
description: Each entry records a vacation/journey/trip in time.

start_date_id.description: YYYYMMDD formatted date when travel started.

start_time.description: HH:MM:SS formatted time when travel started.

end_date_id.description: YYYYMMDD formatted date when travel ended.

end_time.description: HH:MM:SS formatted time when travel ended.

departure_country_iso3_code.description: The ISO 3 code of the departure country.

destination_country_iso3_code.description: The ISO 3 code of the country traveled to.

destination_longitude.description: the length of the trip in days.
